[Home](./index.md) &gt; [subito-connector-mongodb](./subito-connector-mongodb.md) &gt; [Connector](./subito-connector-mongodb.connector.md)

## Connector class

Create a new MongoDB connection

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Connector 
```

## Example


```
new MongoDBConnector(
   'mongodb://mongodb:27017/',
   'subito',
   {
     authSource: 'admin',
     replicaSet: 'rs0',
   }
);
```
